plot: The story of Danger, a worn out rock-star trying to relive the glory days. Little does he know that his actions and wild ways will forever influence his son. A short for Allison Anders' punk film class.
title: Dangerously Punk
plot_es: The story of Danger, a worn out rock-star trying to relive the glory days. Little does he know that his actions and wild ways will forever influence his son. A short for Allison Anders' punk film class.
